org.nise.ux.asl.run

Class ParallelServiceClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nise.ux.asl.run.ParallelServiceClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, ServiceClient

    public class ParallelServiceClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable, ServiceClient
    This is the Client Class of this service library.
    To use this library create an instance of Server class using ServiceServerBuilder.create()
    Client Side code:
       ParallelServiceClient client = new ParallelServiceClient(host, port, concurrency);
       TypeToken<ReturnObject> type4Return = new TypeToken<ReturnObject>() {
       };
       ReturnObject response = client.invokeServiceCommand(type4Return, "example", input);

    OR

       ParallelServiceClient client = new ParallelServiceClient(host, port, concurrency);
       ReturnObject response = client.invokeServiceCommand(ReturnObject.class, "example", input);
    Author:
    Yaser Eftekhari ( ^ - ^ )
    See Also:
    ServiceServerBuilder, ServiceServer, SequentialServiceClient, WorkerFactory, Worker, MapCommand, CommandChain
